name: Underdog
description: Win a battle with a less than 25% chance of winning.

name: Never Lucky
description: Lose a battle with a more than 75% chance of winning.

name: Pirate
description: Collect another user's bot in battle.

name: Terminator
description: Destroy another user's bot in battle.

name: Tactician
description: Win a battle using a non-balanced chip.

name: Quad Core
description: Win a battle using a power chip.

name: Battery Saver
description: Win a battle using a lifespan chip.

name: Security Threat
description: Win a battle using a viral chip.

name: Inpenetrable Wall
description: Win a battle using a firewall chip.

name: Investor
description: Sell a bot on the global market.

name: Depleted
description: Use up all of your daily energy.

name: Supporter
description: Vote for Bot Brawler ‚ù§.

name: Networking
description: Send a request to another user.

name: Get Lucky
description: Get a 100% date score on the Ramselle's Dating Simulator minigame.

name: Jackpot
description: Capture an orange prize in Bostrom's Claw Machine minigame.

name: Tooty Fruity
description: Get 7 lemons in a row in Trojo's Slot Machine minigame.

name: Spoilt Brat
description: Get a negative score in Constant's Doll House minigame.

name: Pals
description: Make a new friend in Bot Brawler.

name: Guinea Pig
description: Complete all of Professor Diriski's training battles.

name: Mechanic
description: Rebuild a destroyed bot.
